hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to say while prostrating himself: O Lord, forgive me all my sins, small and great, first and last, open and secret

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُقَالُ فِي الرُّكُوعِ وَالسُّجُودِ
chapter.eng-name: What Is To Be Said While Bowing And Prostrating
